omdb.plot: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.
A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil Queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

When Elizabeth Bennet meets the handsome Mr. Darcy, she believes he is the last man she could ever marry, but as their lives become intertwined, she finds herself captivated by the man she has sworn to hate forever.

In 19th century Massachusetts, the March sisters--Meg, Jo, Beth, and Amy--on the threshold of womanhood, go through many ups and downs in life and endeavor to make important decisions about their futures.

movies.title: The House with a Clock in Its Walls

omdb.plot: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.
A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.
Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others...
The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.
When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
omdb.actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

omdb.plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
omdb.actors: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young

omdb.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
omdb.actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson

omdb.plot: A computer hacker is abducted into a digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.
omdb.actors: Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner, David Warner

omdb.plot: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.
omdb.actors: Matthew Broderick, Ally Sheedy, John Wood

omdb.plot: An apprentice witch, three kids, and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.
omdb.actors: Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall

omdb.plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.
omdb.actors: Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Peter Coyote

omdb.plot: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.
omdb.actors: Gene Wilder, Jack Albertson, Peter Ostrum

omdb.plot: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.
omdb.actors: Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Robin Wright

omdb.plot: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.
omdb.actors: Dick Van Dyke, Sally Ann Howes, Lionel Jeffries

movies.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

omdb.plot: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he ever imagined.
omdb.actors: Ben Stiller, Kristen Wiig, Jon Daly

omdb.plot: A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.
omdb.actors: Sam Neill, Julian Dennison, Rima Te Wiata

omdb.plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

omdb.plot: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.
omdb.actors: Michelle Yeoh, Stephanie Hsu, Jamie Lee Curtis

omdb.plot: Paddington, now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.
omdb.actors: Ben Whishaw, Hugh Grant, Hugh Bonneville

omdb.plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.
omdb.actors: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig

omdb.plot: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.
omdb.actors: Steve Carell, Toni Collette, Greg Kinnear

omdb.plot: A set of circumstances makes Anna Scott, a famous actress, fall in love with William Thacker, owner of a bookstore in Notting Hill. But the paparazzi's fascination with her complicates their bond.
omdb.actors: Hugh Grant, Julia Roberts, Richard McCabe

omdb.plot: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.
omdb.actors: Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling, Julianne Moore

omdb.plot: A high-school boy, Cameron, cannot date Bianca until her anti-social older sister, Kat, has a boyfriend. So, Cameron pays a mysterious boy, Patrick, to charm Kat.
omdb.actors: Heath Ledger, Julia Stiles, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
